alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:36PM EST until January 16 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for a storm total of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Vermont and Essex County, New York. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of near 1 inch per hour with visibilities below a half mile will continue at times into the early evening before snow comes to an end tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
